attributes.additional_details: The wrongdoing in this world never ceases to disgust me. Arrogant people will be the downfall of our society. Bigots that claim hate speeches are their “right” are wrong. Freedom of speech is expressing yourself in good ways. Not spitting venom at people. Everyone should be treated equally. Sexual orientation or the colour of your skin shouldn’t matter. I beg of you to help stop the injustice of verbal and physical bullying stop. Don’t be a sheep and follow those that discriminate against others, change the way people think. Racist remarks are said too often, they aren’t acceptable. Words hurt… Its necessary we stand up for each other. Show bullies the pain they cause. Sign this petition and stop bullying forever… If a 14 year old (me) can understand this why can’t you?
